channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 18:43 Reduce the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 游릭 18:43 Reduce the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Kharkiv Territorial Community and Kharkiv Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv.
